name: Java Script
details: JavaScript is better for website development Hands down, JavaScript is undeniably better than Python for website development for one simple reason: JS runs in the browser while Python is a backend server-side language. While Python can be used in part to create a website, it can't be used alone.What is JavaScript ? JavaScript is a dynamic computer programming language. It is lightweight and most commonly used as a part of web pages, whose implementations allow client-side script to interact with the user and make dynamic pages. It is an interpreted programming language with object-oriented capabilities.
